<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>false</admin_overrides><advanced>false</advanced><condition table="x_762203_green_swa_catalog_data.*">usernameDYNAMIC90d1921e5f510100a9ad2572f2b477fe^EQ<item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></condition><description>ACL rule for rejected items visibility </description><name>x_762203_green_swa_catalog_data.*</name><operation display_value="read">read</operation><script><![CDATA[/*
	When the current status == rejected 
	Only the person who uploaded the item can see that record in the rejected items module 
	the 'uploaded by' field should match with the users who can see that   
	table is : item catalog
	
*/

]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>sukh.gill</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-03-16 15:40:12</sys_created_on><sys_id>95d02c9107164110ac9bf8ed7c1ed0e6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_762203_green_swa_catalog_data.*</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Green Swap Shop" source="x_762203_green_swa">f6bf51942f610110184155272799b66f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Green Swap Shop">f6bf51942f610110184155272799b66f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_95d02c9107164110ac9bf8ed7c1ed0e6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>sukh.gill</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-03-16 15:40:48</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>
